name: Joint Lab
bio: makes collaborative explorations across sciences with models and data

name: Computational Ethics lab
bio: works to gain a deeper understanding of the ethical impacts of emerging technology on socio-technological systems.

name: Computational Story Lab
bio: works on large-scale, system-level problems in many fields including sociology, nonlinear dynamics, networks, ecology, and physics.

name: UVM Neurobotics Lab
bio: take inspiration from natural systems in biology psychology and neuroscience to help us design autonomous robots and decision making systems.

name: Computational Finance Lab
bio: study modern financial markets from a systems perspective using the tools of statistical physics systems engineering and data science.

name: Control and Optimization of Renewable Energy
bio: imrpove our fundamental understanding of power and energy systems.

name: Bagrow Lab
bio: to understand and predict the behavior of complex social and technological systems from team collaborations and activity on social media to power grids the stock market and more.

name: UVM Glass Brain Lab
bio: engineers new ways to study the brain in real life.

name: Grid Verification Lab
bio: focuses on problems at the intersection power grid optimization and machine learning verification.

name: Lauterbur EvoEco Lab
bio: tackles questions at the intersection of evolution and ecology, combining techniques and theories to discover a broader picture of how organisms live and evolve in the context of natural ecosystems..
